titles: An Account of the purging and planting of the congregation of Dalkeith ... published for information and satisfaction of these who are willing and desirous to know the truth of the foresaid affair ... and particularly for the information of the members of the next General Assembly.
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.

(from t.p.) I. The copy of a late paper intituled, Information for Mr. Alexander Heriot, &c. -- II. A short relation of the presbytery of Dalkeith, their procedure in reference to the sentencing of Mr. Heriot, and their planting of the congregation of Dalkeith -- III. An answer to that paper called, Information for Mr. Alexander Heriot, (designed) minister at Dalkeith.
